featured.text: Over 95 percent of all public television stations have tele-courses.

definition.zh_def: 電視或電信的縮寫，通常指遠距離的通信或傳輸。
definition.en_def: A prefix meaning 'distant' or 'far off', often used in terms related to communication or transmission.
definition.example: We watched the game on the tele last night.
